articles.description: Tesla, the major player in the electric car industry, is set to open up some of its charging stations to all US electric vehicles for the first time. Under the new plan, at least 7,500 charging points from Tesla's Supercharger and Destination Charger networks…

articles.title: GOP subpoenas tech CEOs as part of probe into censorship
